title: Quicksilvers' Staff File
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:blankstyle]]
[[module css]]
.footnotes-footer {
display:none;
}
[[/module]]
[[module css]]
body{
    --barColour: #8c8c8c;
}

:root{
  --header-title: "Quicksilvers' Staff File";
  --header-subtitle: "Showing Competent Practices (or, Successfully Creating Products)";
}

#header h1 a:before {
    font-size: 2.0rem;
}

div#extra-div-1 {
    background-image: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-6/BlankstyleSCP-2.png);
    filter: opacity(50%);
}

#page-content .info-container {
    --link-color: rgb(var(--swatch-text-general));
}

#page-content .info-container .translation_block {
    display: none;
}

#page-content .info-container .collapsible-block-link,
#page-content .info-container:hover .collapsible-block-link {
    line-height: 1.6em;
}

#page-content .info-container .collapsible-block-folded,
#page-content .info-container .collapsible-block-unfolded-link {
    display: grid;
}

#page-content .info-container .collapsible-block-folded .collapsible-block-link,
#page-content .info-container .collapsible-block-link {
    -webkit-mask: unset;
            mask: unset;
    background: transparent;
    grid-column: 1;
    grid-row: 1;
    opacity: 0;
}

[[/module]]
‚ÄÉ
‚ÄÉ
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

‚ÄÉ

> When I go to bed, I dream of frenzy and I dream of chaos. In these dreams, I am forced to bear witness and to experience, locked in a rictus of open-eyed staring wide, chittering in their sockets and digesting their surrounding world. In doing so, I am both the prisoner and the warden simultaneously. In sleeping, I lock myself away in the prison of my mind.
> 
> So to avoid this, I simply //do not sleep.//
[[>]]
[[size 73%]]//A journal page found in an empty room in Site-12.//[[/size]]
[[/>]]

> [[=]]
> **STAFF NOTICE**
> [[/=]]
> ------
> 
> Reminder to all members of Foundation staff that establishing contact with Researcher Silvester is an affair delegated to and facilitated by the Communications Department due to cross-planal interference and mistranslation. If you need to reach Rs. Silvester regarding topics such as:
> * magical thinking;
> * solipsistic phenomena;
> * multiverse theory;
> * dream analysis;
> * semanto-miotic separation from physical forms; and
> * events for staff morale,
> we request you please dial //338-902-0000// to be put in touch with a representative of the Communications Department in order to schedule a meeting.
> 
> Thank you.
[[>]]
[[size 73%]]//A small printed flyer found sporadically in Site-11.//[[/size]]
[[/>]]

> i really like your tie :D
[[>]]
[[size 73%]]//Found written in crayon on the western wall of Dr. Poerson's office.//[[/size]]
[[/>]]
‚ÄÉ
‚ÄÉ
[[=]]
//{{Accessing employee file...}}//
[[/=]]
‚ÄÉ
‚ÄÉ
[[>]]
[[include component:image-block
| name=lakeview.jpg
| caption=Image taken from personal device of employee. Context unknown.
]]
[[/>]]

**NAME:** --Michael Scraw--[[footnote]] ##blue|Not really.## [[/footnote]]
 --Nicholas Dupont--[[footnote]] ##blue|Nope.## [[/footnote]] --Quinn Silvester--[[footnote]] ##blue|--Eh, this'll settle. I'll come up with a better placeholder eventually.--## [[/footnote]] Clark Silvester[[footnote]] ##blue|//There// we go.## [[/footnote]]

**DATE OF BIRTH:** 12 November 1993[[footnote]] ##blue|Again, not really!## [[/footnote]]

**EMPLOYEE POSITION:** RAISA Junior Archival Staff, Level 3 Investigative Researcher, Level 1 Essophysical Nootropic-tangentialist

**EMPLOYEE STATIONING:** Site-19, Research Site-12, Site-22, Site-‚åò##white|, Site-41, Site-0##

**STAFF DESCRIPTION:** ##blue|Hello! I'm Quicksilvers, known here as Quicksilvers, known in the real world as ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà,[[footnote]] ##blue|This one's a cognitohazard, sorry folks.## [[/footnote]] and known on Twitter as... well, it‚Äôs a secret. ü§´##

##blue|I'm 20something years old, and I enjoy horror movies, drawing, and literature (especially if it's in the cosmic horror subgenre). The more mind-boggling and surreal, the better, honestly. I make a ton of art as well,[[footnote]] ##blue|Which you might see on the previously mentioned Twitter - I'm honestly still a bit apprehensive to post my work here. üòÖ## [[/footnote]] and making stuff is a hobby that I put a lot of passion into.##

##blue|My favorite style of article are those that are vague but specific, the kinds where the wording is chosen carefully in order to push implication and the empty spaces are shaped just enough that they leave space for the uncanny and sometimes disturbing conclusion. Someday, I might even make a list! For now, though, I'll just keep drafting. Thank you for coming to my page.##
‚ÄÉ
‚ÄÉ
